findings.title: Missing parameter validation
findings.description: The constructor and setAuthereumEnsManager function should validate that parameters are non-zero.

findings.title: Potential Issue in CreateProxy Logic
findings.description: Issue with createProxy logic in AuthereumProxyFactory contract.

findings.title: Block Timestamp Manipulation
findings.description: Projects may rely on block timestamps for various purposes. However, it's important to realize that miners individually set the timestamp of a block, and attackers may be able to manipulate timestamps for their own purposes.

findings.title: Non-Standard Way of Proxy
findings.description: The implementation of proxy contract deviates from industry standard, which could potentially lead to unknown issues in the future.

findings.title: Inconsistent Conditional Statement
findings.description: The conditional statement 'authKeys[_authKey] == false' can be simplified to '!authKeys[_authKey]', which is a more conventional and readable approach.

findings.title: SafeMath is not needed
findings.description: The SafeMath library is not necessary and can be removed.

findings.title: Inaccurate Comment about _feeTokenRate
findings.description: The comment '_feeTokenRate Rate of the token (in tokenGasPrice/ethGasPrice) used to pay a fee' is not entirely accurate since it's not used by the underlying '_issueRefund()' function in case of ETH refunds.

findings.title: Package Versions Not Fixed
findings.description: Package versions are not fixed, and package-lock.json is not in the source control. It is recommended to use fixed versions to avoid pulling unintentional breaking changes upon next re-install.
